name: Intermediate Workshop in Performance I
description: This course is intended for students who wish to continue the study of acting for the stage in greater depth. Exercises, discussions, and an increasingly more challenging range of monologues and scenes will be used as vehicles for exploring characterization and the acting process.
prerequisites: [VPDA10H3 & VPDA11H3] or [(VPDA01H3) & (VPDA02H3)] & permission of the Theatre & Performance Studies Teaching Staff
